struct  EFI_FILE_SYSTEM_VOLUME_LABEL

Defines

#define EFI_FILE_SYSTEM_VOLUME_LABEL_ID
#define SIZE_OF_EFI_FILE_SYSTEM_VOLUME_LABEL   OFFSET_OF (EFI_FILE_SYSTEM_VOLUME_LABEL, VolumeLabel)

Variables

EFI_GUID gEfiFileSystemVolumeLabelInfoIdGuid

Detailed Description

Provides a GUID and a data structure that can be used with EFI_FILE_PROTOCOL.GetInfo() or EFI_FILE_PROTOCOL.SetInfo() to get or set the system's volume label. This GUID is defined in UEFI specification.
